name: Innovation Norway
overview:
Innovation Norway offers products and services intended to help boost innovation in business and industry nationwide, foster regional development and promote Norwegian industry and Norway as a tourist destination.

With offices in all counties and in more than thirty countries worldwide, we are easy to get in touch with. Our staffâ€™s knowledge of local and international conditions will help turn customersâ€™ ideas into business successes.

According to its objects clause, Innovation Norway is to be backer and promoter of entrepreneurs, newly-founded and small and medium-sized enterprises that seek to grow, as a rule in an international market. The organisationâ€™s role is to provide or arrange financing, link customer enterprises to know-how and help them build networks for their innovation projects.

As of 1 January 2004, Innovation Norway assumed the duties of the Norwegian Industrial and Regional Development Fund (SND), the Norwegian Trade Council, the Norwegian Tourist Board and the Government Consultative Office for Inventors (SVO).
